name: D-a-s-h
description:
Dash game

Made for friend to speedrun, cause he wanted a game. Inspired by the celeste classic spike clip, where if you land on a block going up you dont die. In this game, land on a block with little or no y velocity, and get SPEED. Currently there are 12 levels. Note game does not infact save progress. Reason being I don't want to do that right now.

Controls (Can be found in game)

r - restart

c - jump, can be used in the air if not on ground

x - float, adds speed

z - dash down, sets x velocity to a constant

arrow keys - move

escape - back

To play individual levels, just click the picture of the level

Credits:

Art found on:

https://kenney.nl/assets/abstract-platformer
